tit.cmt: スペースを補足しました。

sen.j: 平等院鳳翔館（びょうどういんほうしょうかん）は京都府宇治市の平等院の敷地内にある博物館。
sen.e: Byodoin Temple Museum Hoshokan is a museum located in the grounds of Byodoin Temple in Uji City Kyoto.
Byodoin Temple Museum Hoshokan is a museum located in the grounds of Byodoin Temple in Uji City Kyoto.
Byodoin Temple Museum Hoshokan is a museum located in the grounds of Byodoin Temple in Uji City, Kyoto Prefecture.
The museum opened on March 1st, 2001.
The museum opened on March 1st, 2001.
The museum opened on March 1, 2001.
sen.cmt: 日付表記を変えました。

sen.j: 「宗教法人としては初」となる総合登録博物館とうたわれている。
sen.e: It is touted as the first registered general museum officially registered by a religious corporation.
It is touted as the first registered general museum officially registered by a religious corporation.
It is touted as 'the first registered general museum officially registered by a religious corporation.'
sen.cmt: クォーテーションを補足しました。

tit.cmt: 用語集に合わせました。
指示書に合わせました。

sen.j: 建築家栗生明の代表作。
sen.e: It is a representative work of the architect Akira Kuryu.
It is a representative work of the architect Akira Kuryu.
It is a representative work of the architect Akira KURYU.
sen.cmt: 指示書に合わせました。

sen.j: 日本芸術院賞、日本建築学会作品選奨を受賞している。
sen.e: It has been awarded the Japan Art Academy prize and the Architectural Institute of Japan's Annual Architectural Design Commendation.
It has been awarded the Japan Art Academy prize and the Architectural Institute of Japan's Annual Architectural Design Commendation.
It has been awarded the Japan Art Academy prize and the Architectural Institute of Japan's Annual Architectural Design Commendation.

sen.j: 全体のヴォリュームは地下に埋めつつも、スリットの入った庇空間は存在感を見せている。
sen.e: Most of the museum is underground however the slit design in the porch space create an impressive feel.
Most of the museum is underground however the slit design in the porch space create an impressive feel.
Most of the museum is underground however the slit design in the porch space create an impressive feel.

tit.cmt: 指示書に合わせました。

sen.j: コンピュータグラフィックスを使用した堂内再現映像
sen.e: realistic reconstruction of the inner temple using computer graphics
realistic reconstruction of the inner temple using computer graphics
Realistic reconstruction of the inner temple using computer graphics

sen.j: 美術工芸復元作業を収録した番組
sen.e: programs recording restoration of artworks
programs recording restoration of artworks

etc.

and so on.
sen.cmt: 用語集に合わせました。

tit.cmt: 指示書に合わせました。

sen.j: 京都府宇治市宇治蓮華116

sen.j: 西日本旅客鉄道奈良線宇治駅 (JR西日本)から徒歩15分
sen.e: 15 minutes walk from Uji station on the Nara line of West Japan Railway Company (JR West Japan).
15 minutes walk from Uji station on the Nara line of West Japan Railway Company (JR West Japan).
